Authors: - Harsh Kumar, Vaibhav Chandra', metadata={'source': 'idea.pdf', 'file_path': 'idea.pdf', 'page': 1, 'total_pages': 2, 'format': 'PDF 1.7', 'title': '', 'author': 'Harsh kumar', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': 'Microsoft® Word 2021', 'producer': 'Microsoft® Word 2021; modified using iTextSharp 5.1.2 (c) 1T3XT BVBA', 'creationDate': "D:20221012231613+05'30'", 'modDate': "D:20230804234338+05'30'", 'trapped': ''}), Document(page_content='KitabPadhoIndia 
 
Problem statement and Elaboration: - 
 
Let’s start with our idea take an example, you are living in a small city where there is no engineering, 
medical, law, degree colleges, no better facility of higher education lots of student lacking the 
resources needs and unable to get the things they required for their academic practice like books, 
instrument also you know that there are numbers of students are there in the same city, they are the 
students of Higher education, engineering, medical students, who has the books, instruments. As they 
are in hometown after the completion of such so, they have all the tools, equipment that was used 
during their academic year and there is lots of students are lacking the resources they need also there 
is no use of used materials for the course completed students. They are selling the things in scrap 
center or to the scrap collector vendors.', metadata={'source': 'idea.pdf', 'file_path': 'idea.pdf', 'page': 0, 'total_pages': 2, 'format': 'PDF 1.7', 'title': '', 'author': 'Harsh kumar', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': 'Microsoft® Word 2021', 'producer': 'Microsoft® Word 2021; modified using iTextSharp 5.1.2 (c) 1T3XT BVBA', 'creationDate': "D:20221012231613+05'30'", 'modDate': "D:20230804234338+05'30'", 'trapped': ''}), Document(page_content='And now we are near to find the solution let me take one more example related to that and experienced 
by me. Once me and my friend went to purchase an engineering instrument for the engineering 
drawing. You know what! In such district urban area, we didn’t get it. Then we moved to eatery there, 
we googled the instrument details and found on every e-commerce site there is showing high priced 
and insecure product, we researched lot.  
But it is right said that “NECESSITY IS MOTHER OF INVENTION” then we decided no one has 
done it, we will do it. One more thing to be noted that at that time there are huge numbers of 
engineering students there with their used books and instrument. Unfortunately, we came to know 
that MANUALLY after they came in contact with us after days.  
Moreover, the books that are once used by a single student is kept in his cupboard as a memory but 
this increases the demand of books if we reuse books and other equipment then it will affect our', metadata={'source': 'idea.pdf', 'file_path': 'idea.pdf', 'page': 0, 'total_pages': 2, 'format': 'PDF 1.7', 'title': '', 'author': 'Harsh kumar', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': 'Microsoft® Word 2021', 'producer': 'Microsoft® Word 2021; modified using iTextSharp 5.1.2 (c) 1T3XT BVBA', 'creationDate': "D:20221012231613+05'30'", 'modDate': "D:20230804234338+05'30'", 'trapped': ''})]
answer: I am KitabPadhoIndia, a template designed to help students in rural areas access educational resources and materials without having to search manually or spend exorbitant amounts of money. I aim to bridge the gap between students who have completed their education and those who are still pursuing higher education by providing a platform for used books and instruments to be reused and resold.
